jobDescription: Endoscopy Nurse - RNWhite Glove Placement Inc. is a nurse staffing agency. We staff many major hospitals, nursing homes, correctional facilities and other healthcare institutions. We are currently hiring Endoscopy RN Registered Nurses to fill vacancies at one of our client Hospitals in New York City.As an Endoscopy Nurse you will assist specialist when endoscopy is being performed on a patient. Duties also include interviewing patients to obtain medical information; measuring patients’ vital signs, weight and height; and administering medications for sedation during procedures. This opportunity awaits a motivated and ambitious RN with endoscopy experience.Full time and/or per diemDay and Evening ShiftsVarious hoursBenefits for Endoscopy Nurse – RN Registered Nurse:Excellent salariesWeekly payrollDirect deposit for your convenienceHealth coverageMetro CardsReferral bonuses for referring nurse friends.Requirements for RN Registered Nurse – Endoscopy positions include:RN Registered Nurse New York State LicenseEndoscopy experience as a RN Registered NurseEligibility to work in United States
